casebody.data:
STATE v. PEAN. No. COA05-647. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed March 7, 2006. Certification Date March 27, 2006. Appeal from Mecklenburg (03CRS249263, 03CRS249264, 03CRS249267, 03CRS249268, 03CRS249271)

Case without published opinion. No error in the trial, remanded for resentencing.
